title: 5br/2ba ►Updated, Full-Floor, Flat
posting_body: Please reply by email to this posting.
•UPDATED, FULL-FLOOR, FLAT, IN A THREE-UNIT BUILDING!
•Remodeled gas kitchen with granite countertops, dishwasher, and disposal
•Five rooms with closets (two of the rooms are small)
This updated, full-floor, Victorian flat in a three-unit building is situated in one of the city’s most delightful neighborhoods: The Inner Mission.
Trendy restaurants, shopping, and the nightlife of Valencia Street Gourmet Ghetto are within walking distance from your new home.
The 16th St. BART Station is four blocks away, and public transportation is everywhere.
Street parking is easy, and there is nearby access to the 280 or 101 freeways for a quick commute to the Valley.
The financial district and SoMa are only ten minutes away, and there are many private and tech bus routes nearby.
Walk Score: 98 - Transit Score: 86 – Bike Score: 99
First month's rent and a security deposit of ONE month's rent.
The lease is for one year..
The move-in date is anytime in August or September 1st.
Thank you for reading this posting.
Your average monthly rent is reduced to $5,199, with the first month's RENT FREE.
If you would like to schedule a private viewing, please reply by email to this posting.
